name: Gory Groceries
description:
Collect all 173 Coins and Kill as many zombies as you can while more spawn in!

You can Jump really high but the kick from the Shotgun lets you jump even higher! The SMG so much recoil that you can even use it to fly around the map!

This Prototype Build is purely for playtesting. I want as much feedback as possible so please let me know what you think!
